page.title: 10 A Beccles Lorry Driver.
page.content: 6:00am-Up I get.Never know where I'm going to go.I'm just told and thats that.Heading for some place with a new load.8 hours.Time for a rest.Off I go again,nearing my destination.Going to Liverpool.Hope I'll be back before the weekend because I'm in charge of a stall at the school fete.Can I get from Liverpool to Beccles in 2 days?Haven't seen my family for days,sleeping in the cab.Gets a bit hot and smelly in the summer.I only drive at 35mph.I can go at 50mph.If I go too fast the trailer may tip over.Back to Beccles at last.Up the London Rd.overthe railway crossing, lucky the gates were open,now the sharp turn at the depot entrance,sign in at the gate.Just in time for bed. Would you be a lorry driver?
